description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，华为创始人任正非之子，毕业于中国科学技术大学，现任华为下属的慧通公司总经理。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, son of Huawei founder Ren Zhengfei, graduated from the University of Science and Technology of China, and currently serves as the general manager of Huitong Company, a subsidiary of Huawei.

description.zh-cn: 任正非的前妻，任平和孟晚舟的母亲。
description.en: Ren Zhengfei's ex-wife, mother of Ren Ping and Meng Wanzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，华为技术有限公司的创始人兼总裁。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, founder and president of Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，任正非之女，任平的胞姊。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, daughter of Ren Zhengfei and elder sister of Ren Ping.

en: University of Science and Technology of China

description.zh-cn: 位于中国安徽省合肥市的一所著名公立研究型大学。
description.en: A prominent public research university in Hefei, Anhui, China.

description.zh-cn: 一家提供信息与通信技术基础设施和智能终端的中国跨国科技公司。
description.en: A Chinese multinational technology corporation that provides information and communications technology infrastructure and smart devices.

description.zh-cn: 华为技术有限公司下属的全资子公司。
description.en: A wholly-owned subsidiary of Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd.
The provincial capital of Sichuan province in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国浙江省金华市下辖的一个县。
description.en: A county under the administration of Jinhua City, in Zhejiang Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 任平是孟军的儿子，16岁前跟随母亲姓孟。
description.en: Ren Ping is the son of Meng Jun and used his mother's surname, Meng, until he was 16.

description.zh-cn: 任平是华为公司创始人兼总裁任正非的儿子。
description.en: Ren Ping is the son of Ren Zhengfei, the founder and president of Huawei.
Ren Ping is the younger brother of Meng Wanzhou.

description.zh-cn: 任平毕业于中国科学技术大学。
description.en: Ren Ping graduated from the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 任平担任华为下属的慧通公司总经理。
description.en: Ren Ping serves as the General Manager of Huitong Company, a subsidiary of Huawei.

description.zh-cn: 慧通公司是华为的下属公司。
description.en: Huitong Company is a subsidiary of Huawei.

description.zh-cn: 任正非是华为公司的创始人。
description.en: Ren Zhengfei is the founder of Huawei.

description.zh-cn: 任正非担任华为公司的总裁。
description.en: Ren Zhengfei serves as the President of Huawei.

description.zh-cn: 任平1975年10月出生于四川成都。
description.en: Ren Ping was born in Chengdu, Sichuan in October 1975.

description.zh-cn: 任平的籍贯是浙江浦江县。
description.en: Ren Ping's ancestral home is Pujiang County, Zhejiang.
